column6: An introductory course in modern methods and techniques used for information acquisition, processing, storage, conversion, transmission and display.

A course dealing with the network concepts and methodologies, implementation, monitoring, performance evaluation, service, optimization and control of modern network systems. Two hours lecture and two hours lab.
A course in the concepts and application of fiber optic technology to industrial, medical, local area networks and digital communication systems. One hour lecture and 2 hours lab.
